sense.def:
To lurk somewhere
pomeni nekje na skrivaj čakati.

seg.quote: Wild boars and wolves lurked near the isolated camp.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer spomin, sum ali nevarnost,
lurks
, obstaja, vendar se tega le nejasno zavedamo.

seg.quote: ...outdated prejudices lurking in the minds of individuals.
